name: Easy Video Gallery Responsive HTML5
author: wpFad

sections.description:
Easy Video Gallery Responsive HTML5 is a WordPress Plugin, which can be used to intergration multiple video gallery to any wordpress site in easy way. This plugin support both Youtube and Vimeo video with automatic and custom thumbnail. Also this already support AJAX, HTML5, responsive design and mobile friendly.

A brief Markdown Example

  1. Multiple Gallery
  2. Youtube & Vimeo Video
  3. Automatic & Custom Thumbnail
  4. Resposive Design & Mobile Friendly
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-video folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add some video & gallery in Easy Videos menu
  4. Place [easy-video video="12" column="4" gallery=""] shortcode to post or page you want to display Video Gallery

short_description: Easy intergration multiple video gallery to any wordpress site. Support Youtube & Vimeo video with responsive design and mobile friendly.
